locales.name: rip in time
locales.desc: This can't possibly be a bad idea.

locales.name: test in time
locales.desc: Testing version of rip in time, only has 1 encounter.

tasks.desc: Untangle the paradoxes. Assert your existence.
tasks.flavor: It's as if you ever existed.

potions.name: draught of memory
potions.desc: Grants you precise and immutable memory, for a time.

resources.name: time paradox
resources.desc: Hold on, the stables were demolished a century ago?
resources.flavor: No relation to usage of postmen to deliver volatile materials.

resources.desc: Time is a dangerous thing. Try not to wink out of existence

furniture.name: clockwork cabinet
furniture.desc: An enormous collection of clocks, all tuned to different times.
furniture.flavor: It took a lot of time to make this, not that you kept track

rares.name: time's flowering edge
rares.desc: Blossoming flows of time coalesce into a cutting edge right before your eyes.

upgrades.name: ledger of time
upgrades.desc: A book of uncertain dimensions, containing exacting information about various states of the universe.

upgrades.name: paradox disentanglement
upgrades.desc: A paradox is nothing but a simple inconsistency in the universe. Nothing a little mathemagic cannot solve.

upgrades.name: instability mitigation
upgrades.desc: Time is merciless to those who abuse it. However, there may be ways to soften the blow.

upgrades.name: restful stabilization
upgrades.desc: With the immense amount of practice, you can streamline the stabilization process allowing you to regain more strength while using it.

upgrades.name: time-rip exploitation
upgrades.desc: Now that you have walked the timelines so many times, you can shorten the time needed to procure time gems significantly.

upgrades.name: rip concentration
upgrades.desc: With an expenditure of specially-prepared conduits, further improvements to time collection efficiency are possible.

spells.name: perfect stability
spells.desc: Unleash the stored time to mask your own meddling.

spells.name: temporal anchor
spells.desc: Utilize an anchor to achieve transient temporal stability.

spells.name: mind resilience
spells.desc: Steel your mind against the ravages of time.

encounters.name: stablehand
encounters.desc: You see someone feeding a horse. This is a test encounter, dumbass.

encounters.name: stablehand
encounters.desc: You see someone feeding a horse. Seems like an incredibly mundane job.

encounters.name: stablehand
encounters.desc: You see someone feeding a horse. As you turn to leave, you knock a candle over.

encounters.name: apprentice
encounters.desc: An apprentice fumbles a simple errand for his master.

encounters.name: quiet night
encounters.desc: No sound is heard, as a figure carrying a pillow approaches a bedroom.

encounters.name: graduation
encounters.desc: An old miser takes an unfair fee from a young adept.

encounters.name: unnatural insight
encounters.desc: An apprentice leaves his master behind, having no need for formal instruction. Highly unusual...

encounters.name: dark pledge
encounters.desc: Cursed words echo in the surrounding darkness, pledging themselves to the darker arts.

encounters.name: squelch
encounters.desc: You see a collection of organs, neatly preserved in jars. The sounds of dissection can be heard in the next room.

encounters.name: squelch
encounters.desc: You see a collection of organs, neatly preserved in jars. A bone crunches underfoot.

encounters.name: treasury
encounters.desc: Piles of gold and gems surround you. You take a gem along.

encounters.name: steaming cauldron
encounters.desc: Some sort of soup is boiling in a large pot. The stock seems to be extremely rich in life force.

encounters.desc: A blacksmith is hammering his needle into the soft silk. With every stitch, the potion's hue changes slightly, as the engraving spreads across the surface of the clock.

encounters.name: busy street
encounters.desc: As you walk down the street your pocket suddenly feels lighter.

encounters.name: odor
encounters.desc: A chamber of rotten meat lies in front of you. You suddenly feel peckish

encounters.name: spells flashing
encounters.desc: A spellslinger is fighting off a horde of monsters with his trusty blade and a veritable arsenal of spells

encounters.name: fiery chamber
encounters.desc: An odd wizard gulps down a potion and collapses, his body twisting into a grotesque, scaly form.

encounters.name: sharp air
encounters.desc: A blade stops an inch from your face as a confused swordsman looks on.

encounters.name: weave of death
encounters.desc: Cleft cleanly in twain, the monster collapses, revealing an armored figure.

encounters.name: otherwordly portal
encounters.desc: Staff raised high, a distant figure opens a portal for a demonic horde to pass through.

encounters.name: ghastly sight
encounters.desc: A row of automata passes before you, searching for the one that managed to escape.

encounters.name: ghastly sight
encounters.desc: A row of automata passes before you, brought here by an unusual magical aura.

encounters.name: dimensional rift
encounters.desc: Multiple creatures congregate on this site, summoned by a friendly wizard.

encounters.name: busy lab
encounters.desc: Retorts, alembics and vials of all shapes and sizes occupy this space.

encounters.name: deep cavern
encounters.desc: You shout, but the echo doesn't come back.

encounters.name: heart of the storm
encounters.desc: It's calm here, even as the elements tear the world apart.

encounters.name: tender seedling
encounters.desc: In an unusually large garden, a single seedling is planted.

encounters.name: tender seedling
encounters.desc: In an unusually large garden, a single seedling was planted.

encounters.name: the seer
encounters.desc: There is no point in hiding. He knew you would come, after all.

encounters.name: high tower
encounters.desc: Secluded in a room above the clouds, the loremaster performs his research.

encounters.name: end
encounters.desc: Nothing. Just as he foretold

encounters.name: bone plains
encounters.desc: A wasteland where no one living dares to tread.

encounters.name: a mirror
encounters.desc: An enormous pane stands before you, reflecting everything perfectly. You wink.

encounters.name: a mirror
encounters.desc: An enormous pane stands before you, reflecting everything perfectly. Your reflection winks.

encounters.name: a plateau
encounters.desc: Two wizards stand opposite, on a symmetrical featureless plane. They wink.

encounters.name: a workshop
encounters.desc: Tools are scattered about, seemingly without rhyme or reason.

events.name: odd feeling
events.desc: Errant memories tug at the edges of your conciousness.
